title: Rambles in Europe:
author: Morrison, Leonard Allison
snippet: This clan had many places of strength in these parts, such as Sark, Kinmont, Hollgreen, Hollis, Mumbyhirst, the castle of Harelaw, Irving castle near Langholm, Whitehaugh, Mangerton, Pud- dington, Hilles, and others; yet Gilnockie hall, or the home at the Hollows just described, was the strongest of all.

title: Rambles in Europe ... With historical facts relating to Scotch-American families, gathered in Scotland and the North of Ireland ... Illustrated
author: Morrison, Leonard Allison.
snippet: This clan had many places of strength in theseparts, such as Sark, Kinmont, Hollgreen, Hollis,Mumbyhirst, the castle of Harelaw, Irving castlenear Langholm, Whitehaugh, Mangerton, Puddington, Hilles, and others; yet Gilnockie hall,or the home at the Hollows just described, wasthe strongest of all.
